body_html: @nikhilk Thanks. Something like new tf.Tensor() instead of tf.NewTensor() might be a nice addition but I'm not planning on expanding it at the moment. I'm only interested in loading graphs created in python and I think I like the minimalism.
body_text: @nikhilk Thanks. Something like new tf.Tensor() instead of tf.NewTensor() might be a nice addition but I'm not planning on expanding it at the moment. I'm only interested in loading graphs created in python and I think I like the minimalism.
body: @nikhilk Thanks. Something like `new tf.Tensor()` instead of `tf.NewTensor()` might be a nice addition but I'm not planning on expanding it at the moment. I'm only interested in loading graphs created in python and I think I like the minimalism.
